TABLE.NAME: block_objectives
TABLE.COMMENT: Basic settings for an objectives block

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: The course that this objectives block is on

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The text to display at the top of the block

TABLE.NAME: block_objectives_timetable
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the timetable information for the objectives block

FIELD.NAME: objectivesid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the objectives block this timetable entry is for

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the course group this timetable entry is for (0 for everyone)

FIELD.NAME: day
FIELD.COMMENT: Day of the week that this lesson is on (0=Mon, 6=Sun)

FIELD.NAME: starttime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time (in seconds) from start of day that lesson begins

FIELD.NAME: endtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Time (in seconds) from the start of the day that the lesson ends

TABLE.NAME: block_objectives_objectives
TABLE.COMMENT: A list of the lesson objectives for a particular lesson

FIELD.NAME: timetableid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the timetable entry that these objectives relate to

FIELD.NAME: objectives
FIELD.COMMENT: List of lesson objectives, on separate lines, prepended with + for complete, - for incomplete
